content: ❤️ in this crochet tutorial we re going to make a mini oddish optional as a keychain step by step perfect for gifting and decorating it s super cute quick and fun to make español https //youtu be/z-eo40rhujo english https //youtu be/eatkrjrttzc you can find the written pattern from the video in pdf complete https //amigurumisatina etsy com/listing/4310901872 materials used cotton yarn blue 46 green 66 light green 48 you can find them here https //s click aliexpress com/e/_onohllm materials used for chenille version chenille yarn blue 35 green 40 light green 38 you can find them here https //s click aliexpress com/e/_depmvpp difficulty level 4/5 available languages english spanish final size 9 cm / 3 5 inches tall varies depending on materials used ❤️ if you love amigurumis and want to discover more fun and unique patterns please subscribe to my youtube channel and turn on the notification bell so you don t miss any new videos ❤️ please note this pattern is for personal use only it is prohibited to share distribute or publish this pattern on social networks or any other means ✅ you can sell the finished items don t forget to give credit to amigurumisatina as the designer enjoy crocheting and may your oddish come to life with lots of love ♥
